name: RoboRewind
description:
RoboRewind is a puzzle game where a robot follows a set of actions that are predefined, but the program will lead to a endless pit! Luckly you can rewind the actions (play them in reverse) from the start. Lead the little robot to the goal!

Tip: Press Tab during gameplay to call the pause menu.

This is a game that is made for the Brackeys 2020.2 game jam, but I'm still working on it (it's actually finished I'm just saying this so I can tell people who watch my video that I spent a week on this game lol).
